sf241:4: … magadheṣu viharati pūrvavad yāvac chailaguhāyām | ehy enaṁ gatvā paryupāsiṣyāmahe |
sf241:5: paramaṁ bhadraṁ te kauśika | iti paṁcaśikho gandharvaputraḥ śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṁ vīṇām aṁsenādāya śakrasya devendrasya paricaryām upaga … aśauṣur anye ’pi devās trayastriṁśāḥ | śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaś ca gandharvaputra udyuktau bhagavato ’ntikenopadarśanāya bhagavantaṁ paryupāsanāyai | tatas te py udyuktā bhagavato ’ntikenopadarśanāya bhagavantaṁ paryupāsanāyai |
sf241:6: atha śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaś ca gandharvaputro … … tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṁmiñjitaṁ vā bāhuṁ prasārayet prasāritaṁ vā saṁmiñjayed evam eva śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśīkhaś ca gandharvaputraḥ … devās trayastriṁśā deveṣu trayastriṁśeṣv antarhitā… vaidekadasya parvatasya nātidūre |
sf241:7: tena khalu samayena vaidehaka … atīvāvabhāsajāta ivāgnyā … khalu vaidehakasya parvatasya | dā … ādahyate bata vaidehakaḥ parvataḥ … parvataḥ | bata hi vaidehaka …
sf241:8: … śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaṁ gandharvaputraṁ … rūpāṇi tāni tāta paṁcaśikha sa bhagavān araṇyavanapra … vigatajanapadaka … ḥsevitāni pratisaṁlayanasārūpyāṇi | sacet tarhi mahāśakyamahāśaky … r na sukaram upasaṁkrāntuṁ yathāpi tat pūrvam apratisaṁveditaṁ | sacet tvaṁ tāta paṁcaśikha … bhagavato darśanāyopasaṁkrāntuṁ
sf241:9: paramaṁ bhadraṁ tava kauśika | iti paṁcaśikho …
sf241:10: … nātyāsanne bhāṣitasya ca śabdaṁ śroṣyate | iti viditvā
sf241:41: sa eva me bhadanta tayā bhagi …
sf241:44: atha śakrasya devendrasyaitad abhavat | … bhagavāṁ paṁcaśikhena gandharvaputreṇa pratisaṁmodati bhagavāṁ …
sf241:48: para maṁ bhadraṁ tava kauśika | iti paṁcaśikho gandharvaputraḥ śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṁs tenopajāma | upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte ’sthād ekānte sthit …
sf241:62: tau prelṣya saṁvegam agāc ca śakro
sf241:76: …dhātu … lokaś ca | khalu tasmāt satvā yam eva dhātuṁ saṁjānaṁti tam eva dhātuṁ sthāmaśaḥ parāmṛśyābhiniviśyānuvyavaharanti | idam eva satyaṁ moham anyat |
sf241:77: evam etan māriṣa | evam etan māriṣa | na haiva sarvasatvā ekakāmā ekacchandāḥ pūrvavad yāvad
sf241:83: kiṁ nu māriṣa sarve te śramaṇabrāmaṇā atyantamoṣṭhā atyantavimalā atyantabrahmacaryaparyavasānāḥ |
sf241:84: na haiva kauśika | sarve śramaṇabrāhmaṇā atyantaniṣṭhā atyantavimalā atyantabrahmacaryaparyavasānāḥ |
sf241:85: kasmān na kauśika sarve śramaṇabrāhmaṇā atyantaniṣṭhā atyantavimalā atyantabrahmacaryaparyavasānāḥ |
sf241:86: api tu ye kecic chramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vātyanta … tṛṣṇāsaṁkṣayavimuktau sa …
sf241:97: abhijānāsitvāṁ kauśika | itaḥ pūrvam evam aparo ’ pi vivekapratilābhaḥ saumanasyapratilābhaḥ saṁjanitum |
sf241:99: eko bhūtapūrvaṁ devāsura … devā jayaṁty asurāḥ parājayaṁte ta …
sf241:101: … vāyaṁ yad vā divyam ojo yad vāsuram ojastad ubha … samagraṁ … tvā paribhokṣyāmaḥ |
sf241:102: sa khalu me saumanasyapratilābho vivekapratilābhaḥ kalahaparyavasāno bhaṇḍanaparyavasāno vigrahaparyavasāno vivādaparyavasānaḥ |
sf241:103: ayaṁ me saumanasyapratilābho vivekapratilābho ’kalahaparyavasāno ’bhaṇḍanaparyavasāno ’vigrahaparyavasāno ’vivādaparyavasāno yo me bhagavato ’ntike |
sf241:105: tasya mama bhadanta etad abhavad ito ’haṁ cyutvā manuṣyāṇāṁ svabhāvatāyām upapatsyāmi
sf241:106: tatra yāni tāni kulāny āḍhyāni mahādhanāni mahābhogāni prabhūtavittopakaraṇāni
sf241:108: tadrūpāṇi kulāni svabhāvatāyām upapadya vṛddhim anvayād indriyāṇāṁ paripākāt keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikām pravrajiṣyāmi |
sf241:117: … ye te devā rūpino manomayā avikalā ahīnendryāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgapūrṇāḥ śubhavarṇasthāyinaḥ prītbhakṣāḥ prītyahārakāḥ svayaṁprabhā vaihāyasagamā dirghāyuṣo dirgh … upapattir bhaviṣyati |
sf241:142: va au … taṁ pra … sa … ulamadhyāgā…r …
sf241:154: asmiṁ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe śakrasya devendrasya virajo vigatamalaṁ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam aśītīnāṁ ca devatāsahasrāṇām |
sf241:156: dṛṣṭadharmaḥ prāptadharmo viditadharmaḥ paryavagāḍhadharmas tīrṇakāṁkṣas tīrṇavicikitso ’parapratyayo ’nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ |
sf241:157: uttāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṁgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁs tenāṁjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat |
sf241:158: abhikrānto ’haṁ bhadanta abhikrānta eṣo ’haṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca | upāsakaṁ ca mān dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇagatam abhiprasannam |
sf241:159: atha śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaṁ gandharvaputram āmantrayati | upakaras tvaṁ tāta paṁcaśikhāsmākam upakaraś ca yo hi nāma tvaṁ bhagavantam ||
